item.Q:
Write the character:
law; method; way; Buddhist teaching; Legalist; abbr. for France
item.A:
fǎ
方法 fāngfǎ method; way; means

item.Q:
Write the character:
-less; not to have; no; none; not; to lack; un-
item.A:
traditional: 無
wú
无产阶级 (無產階級) wúchǎnjiējí proletariat

item.Q:
Write the character:
correct; right; so; thus; like this; -ly
item.A:
rán
然后 (然後) ránhòu after; then (afterwards); after that; afterwards

item.Q:
Write the character:
but; yet; however; only; merely; still
item.A:
dàn
但是 dànshì but; however

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to be; to act as; manage; withstand; when; during; ought; should; match equally; equal; same; obstruct; just at (a time or place); on the spot; right; just at
2: at or in the very same...; to pawn; suitable; adequate; fitting; proper; replace; represent
item.A:
traditional: 當
1: dāng 2: dàng
当时 (當時) dāngshí then; at that time; while 适当 (適當) shìdàng suitable; appropriate

item.Q:
Write the character:
in; at; to; from; by; than; out of
item.A:
traditional: 於
yú
于是 (於是) yúshì thereupon; as a result; consequently; thus; hence

traditional: 嗎
1: ma 2: mǎ
吗啡 (嗎啡) mafēi joy-powder 吗啡 (嗎啡) mǎfēi morphine

item.Q:
Write the character: nián
(qīngnián de nián)
item.A:
year
青年 qīngnián youth
bùfǎ lawless; illegal; unlawful

traditional: 國法
guófǎ (n) national law
xiǎngfǎ idea; train of thought; what sb is thinking; to think of a way (to do sth)
chéngwénfǎ statute
tífǎ wording (of a proposal); formulation; a technique of Chinese bone setting
wénfǎ grammar
fǎrén (n) lawyer; anyone involved in the legal profession

traditional: 法國
Fǎguó France; French
fǎzi way; method

traditional: 法學
fǎxué law; legal studies
Fǎjīa Legalist school of philosophy (in classical times)
yòngfǎ usage
kànfǎ way of looking at a thing; view; opinion

traditional: 說法
shuōfa way of speaking; wording; formulation; one's version (of events); statement; theory; hypothesis; interpretation
shuōfǎ to expound Buddhist teaching

traditional: 一無所知
yīwúsuǒzhī to be completely ignorant about; not to know anything about

traditional: 無上
wúshàng supreme

traditional: 無中生有
wúzhōngshēngyǒu to create something out of nothing

traditional: 無人
wúrén unmanned; uninhabited

traditional: 無可
wúkě can't

traditional: 無心
wúxīn casualness

traditional: 無我
wúwǒ anatta (Buddhist concept of "non-self")

traditional: 無機
wújī inorganic (chem.)

traditional: 無法
wúfǎ unable; incapable

traditional: 無為
Wúwèi (N) Wuwei (place in Anhui)
wúwèi the Daoist doctrine of inaction
wúwéi inaction

traditional: 無用
wúyòng useless; worthless

traditional: 無知
wúzhī ignorance

traditional: 無能
wúnéng inability; incapable; powerless

traditional: 不以為然
bùyǐwéirán object to; take exception to; not approve
bùrán not so; no; or else; otherwise; if not
dàzìrán nature (as in Mother Nature)
tiānrán natural

traditional: 然後
ránhòu after; then (afterwards); after that; afterwards
ránér however; yet; but
zìrán nature; natural; naturally
zìránrén natural person
zìránérrán involuntary; automatically
yàobùrán otherwise; or else; or

bùdàn not only (... but also...)
búdàn not only
dànshì but; however

traditional: 上當
shàngdàng be take in; be fooled; be duped

traditional: 不當
bùdàng unsuitable; improper; inappropriate

traditional: 家當
jīadàng familial property; belongings

traditional: 得當
dédāng expedient

traditional: 當下
dāngxìa presently; immediately; at once

traditional: 當中
dāngzhōng among; in the middle; in the center

traditional: 當地
dāngdi locally
dāngdì local

traditional: 當天
dàngtiān that day; the same day

traditional: 當家
dāngjīa manage household affairs

traditional: 當心
dāngxīn to take care; to look out

traditional: 當時
dāngshí then; at that time; while

traditional: 當然
dāngrán only natural; as it should be; certainly; of course; without doubt

traditional: 當當
dāngdāng dangdang

traditional: 大於
dàyú (idiom) used between nouns to indicate relative size or importance, A is greater than B

traditional: 於是
yúshì thereupon; as a result; consequently; thus; hence

traditional: 生於
shēngyú to be born in

traditional: 過於
guòyú too much; excessively
chéngběn (manufacturing, production etc) costs
wénběn version; text
běnrén the person himself; oneself; myself; in person; personal

traditional: 本來
běnlái original; originally; at first; it goes without saying; of course

traditional: 本國
běnguó one's own country

běndi local
běndì local; this locality
běnzi book; notebook; edition
běnjīa a member of the same clan; a distant relative with the same family name
běnwén this text; article; the main body of a book
běnshēng Bunsen
běnnéng instinct

traditional: 資本
zīběn capital (as in capitalism)

traditional: 資本家
zīběnjīa capitalist
shàngnián last year
zhōngnián middle-aged

traditional: 來年
láinián next year; the coming year
qùnián last year
tóngnián the same year
duōnián many years

traditional: 多年來
duōniánlái for the past many years
duōniánshēng perennial (of plants)
dànián New Years

traditional: 學年
xuénián academic year

traditional: 年來
niánlái over the last ... years
niánnián year after year; yearly; every year

traditional: 年會
niánhuì annual meeting

traditional: 後年
hòunián the year after next
chéngnián adult
chéngniánrén adult person

traditional: 當年
dāngnián in those days; then; in those years; during that time

traditional: 過年
